text: Congrats to Mineral Wells Palo Pinto Hospital’s Ross Korkmas for winning the @TexasHospitals Pioneer Award for his achievements in managing a rural health care system! https://t.co/K2mH0qPjGM
In honor of ALS Awareness Month we are grateful for the @ALSassociation researchers that have devoted their lives to find a cure! https://t.co/FD4prqpN9m

Biden’s border crisis is real and it is dangerous.  The majority of fentanyl flowing across America’s southern border is coming from Mexico.  Americans deserves border security! https://t.co/7hUd5bEYzI

Today on Peace Officers Memorial Day, we honor all peace officers who have been killed or disabled in the line of duty and the families they leave behind. Thank you for your service and sacrifice. https://t.co/GD9LN3iFNL https://t.co/nTdMKa088g

The TX-12 High School Congressional Art Competition was a great success! All of the contestants’ artwork were outstanding. Congratulations to @KellerISD’s Sarah Coleman for her winning piece “Historic Sinclair on McCart Avenue.” It will look great on display in the U.S. Capitol! https://t.co/hcAXcwId8D

May is Mental Health Awareness month. If you are struggling or know of someone who is, there are resources available. Call 1-800-273-8255 or visit https://t.co/XQ3BekiOw6 for support. https://t.co/CzfeUfI1Ht

During National Police Week, we pay homage to the incredible courage, sacrifice, and selflessness of our officers, who are faced with danger and uncertainty every day. We are grateful for your service – thank you for keeping our communities safe! https://t.co/wmvJxBBytB
